util
Class MessageListener

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      util.MessageListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class MessageListener
extends java.lang.Thread

This is an abstraction which allows the gates to communicate with the simulation. It is just a runnable that sits and continually decodes messages and passes them onto the gate for action
